alert.note: Alert for Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 4:38PM EST until March 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Spring Valley. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water rises into low-lying areas close to the river near Spring Valley, Roxanna and east of Waynesville. Water floods Corwin Road, as well as Waynesville and Middletown Roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
